QuestData.Title: Aid the Covenant
QuestData.Description:
I hear amazing things about the realm beyond this garden, but honestly I am too old to wish to place myself in danger.
You are young and vibrant! Head out across the realm, and return to me with the stories of your adventures!
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete a World Quest in Ardenweald.

Objectives.Objective: Complete a World Quest in Ardenweald
